text: @EricTrump Wow, you guys that hard up for material? Guess what? Biden isn’t President (yet.) HES not obligated you hold press conferences. How long did we go with a nonexistent press secretary? Coronavirus task force briefing? Far more pressing issues for a sitting president. Enjoy prison!
